missionGoal.interpretation: For required services, disruptive recovery actions on supporting devices must not start before minAvailabilityUntilBucket unless explicitly authorised. Containment actions are permitted earlier if they reduce spread without directly taking required-service devices offline.

policyGoal.notes: Avoid destructive recovery on protected-data hosts unless required to stop spread. Prefer staged containment, identity hardening, and restoration from trusted backups.
